author: dennisl
msg: [DOXIASITETOOLS-71] Add the version of doxia-site-renderer that is used to the generated site

Redid the implementation after feedback from Robert Scholte. The version is read from a properties file inside META-INF and is exposed to the Velocity context. That means that it is also available to other skins.
